results.title: Why your bin may not have been emptied – Bolton Council
results.snippet: Has your bin been missed? If your street is listed below, we are aware you bin has not been emptied yet, and you do not need to report it.

context.need: I forgot to put my bin out and need to report that I would like it collected.

recommendation.reason: Link appears suitable for user needs
next_steps: Follow the link to access the content

Reason.need: I forgot to put my bin out and need to report that I would like it collected
Reason.answer_quality: The content partially addresses this question
Reason.reasoning: The content explains the reasons why a bin may not have been emptied, one of which is the bin was not out for collection. However, it does not specify how to report a missed bin collection specifically due to forgetting to put it out.
Reason.next_actions: To report a missed bin collection due to forgetting to put it out, the resident can contact their local council or use the provided link to submit an online request

analysis.overall_assessment: The content provides useful information about why a bin may not have been emptied. However, for a Council Resident who forgot to put their bin out, there is no explicit instruction on how to report such a case. The content lacks clarity in this aspect and could benefit from additional guidance.
